name: Gardevoir

ability.name: Mind Meld
ability.effect: Each Psychic Energy attached to your Pokemon provides two Psychic Energy instead of one.

attacks.name: Pain Split
attacks.effect: Combine the damage counters between Gardevoir and the Defending Pokemon. Gardevoir takes half rounded down. The Defending Pokemon takes half rounded up.

attacks.name: Black Hole
attacks.effect: Move the top 5 cards in your opponent's discard to the Lost Zone.

flavor: It can make black holes. This is directly from the lore, it happened in the anime and it wasn't really that big of a deal. Anyways
